title: ENJOY THE AMBIANCE OF A LONDON CLUB IN MIDTOWN!
desc:
OP.LOUNGE, THE OUT PROFESSIONALS NETWORKING CLASSIC, TAKES OVER THE TOWNHOUSE FOR THE SEASON?S FIRST HOLIDAY PARTY.   On Wednesday evening, December 2, Members and friends of Out Professionals get primed for the holidays at TownHouse, the timeless East Side duplex where ?the three tidy bars resemble those found in grand-dame hotels and gentlemen's clubs? (New York Magazine). 
 The refreshed and reinvigorated premises ? ours exclusively between 6 and 9 ? offer ?lots of sitting areas for conversation, nice large bars and music in the background? (NewYork.GayCities.com). The lighting is soft, the drinks are strong, and ?a sing-along might erupt at the stroke of a piano key? (Time Out New York). 
 Grab your business cards and come hang out with Members of Out Professionals ? OP.LYNX, our dynamic women?s network ? and OP.PRIME, the network for up-and-coming LGBT professionals, tonight at TownHouse (?Cozy without crossing the line to stuffy? ? New York Magazine). 
 WHAT'S UP Networking and socializing from 6 p.m. All drinks $2 off until 8 p.m. Then, an Absolute vodka special until 9 p.m. Complimentary passed hors d?oeuvres. Checkroom available. Note: $20 credit-card minimum; ATM on premises.
